items.title: Intelligent Inspection
items.description: A computer vision-based intelligent inspection system, sold 50,000 units, saving $24M annually.

items.title: Storyboard AI
items.description: Storyboard AI is my personal project, built on the qwen2.5pro model, enabling video generation from storyboards.

items.title: Intelligent Cockpit
items.description: Demonstration of the intelligent cockpit deploying a large model on an in-vehicle computer for voice interaction, combining geolocation data to place orders.

items.title: Merchant Support Chatbot
items.description: Dynamically embedded within the Alibaba Merchant Workbench, combining self-service and live support to provide high-quality service.

items.title: In-Vehicle Mini Program
items.description: Provides music, navigation, voice assistant, meal ordering, and more without downloads, directly on the car infotainment system, achieving 10% monthly active usage.

items.title: AI Study Desk
items.description: Automates 80% of children's homework tutoring using Python Tkinter, Flask, and Qwen-Omni-VL.

items.title: 3D hand tracking
items.description: Use 3D video tracking technology to control the changes of the virtual ball.

items.title: Job Seeker
items.description: Automatically crawl and match the job opportunities that best match your resume, score them, generate a cover letter for high-scoring opportunities, and finally generate a tracking list.

items.title: Terminal-style Website
items.description: Deepseek R1 0528 to create a terminal-style personal website. I uploaded my resume information, and then the model completely handled all the tasks for me.
